title: its pretty easy to tell a bot account on treeline
body:
1.  they will not respond to anything you do.  they will just stand there and aa minions, maby throw a spell every now and then.  they will not help you if you get into a fight with an enemy.  their in-game behavior is pretty recognizable.

2.  they will take odd summoners and masteries.  such as warlords on soraka or windspeakers blessing on xerath.  and they will only have 1 page. most of the time they take {{summoner:7}}  and {{summoner:6}} ,  i've seen a few with {{summoner:4}}  and {{summoner:21}}  but never {{summoner:11}} .

3.  they will have no runes.  this is a big one, in the post game lobby, if you look at their profile, their runes pages will be completely blank.

you dont get to lvl 30 and not learn about these things

there, we now have 3 defining characteristics, can we implement something to stop the bots on this map?  i shouldn't have to remind anyone that this is a form pf scripting and is an instant ban if caught.

i have not had a single game this season in treeline blind pick that did not have one of these bots in it.

replies.body:
I do like Twisted Treeline for a little variety and I too have been forced to deal with this. It basically comes down to whichever team has the most bots on their side. Though, I did literally play a game with all bots but me and had a bit of fun with Malzahar. Still, it's stupid. Can we also just take a second to appreciate how depreciated and unappriciated TT is? It makes me sad.
